title: [K-12] Mobile-Based Introduction to Anatomy: Short-Term Intensive Distance Learning Program

context.additional_context: A foundational anatomy course adapted to non-face-to-face educational environments post-COVID-19. Time-efficient learning design utilizing mobile devices.

learning_goals: Identify 15 major structures of the head-neck region with 85% accuracy using online 3D anatomy models.
Achieve over 90% mastery of anatomy terminology memorization through weekly mobile quizzes.
Perform collaborative activities with peer learners to explain functional associations of anatomical structures three or more times in virtual discussion rooms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
